description: An instant messaging and VoIP social platform.

tools.name: DISCORD_GET_INVITE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific invite code. Use when you need to get details about a guild or channel associated with an invite.

with_counts.title: With Counts
with_counts.description: Whether the invite should contain approximate member counts.

with_expiration.title: With Expiration
with_expiration.description: Whether the invite should contain the expiration date.

guild_scheduled_event_id.title: Guild Scheduled Event Id
guild_scheduled_event_id.description: The guild scheduled event to include with the invite.

tools.name: DISCORD_GET_MY_GUILD_MEMBER
tools.description: Retrieves the guild member object for the currently authenticated user within a specified guild, provided they are a member of that guild.

inputSchema.title: GetMyGuildMemberRequest

guild_id.title: Guild Id
guild_id.description: The unique identifier of the Discord guild (server) from which to fetch the member object.

inputSchema.description: Defines the request parameters for retrieving the authenticated user's member object from a specific guild.

tools.name: DISCORD_GET_MY_OAUTH2_AUTHORIZATION
tools.description: Retrieves current OAuth2 authorization details for the application, including app info, scopes, token expiration, and user data (contingent on scopes like 'identify').

inputSchema.title: GetMyOauth2AuthorizationRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving the current OAuth2 authorization information.

tools.name: DISCORD_GET_MY_USER
tools.description: Fetches comprehensive profile information for the currently authenticated Discord user, including email if the 'email' scope is granted.

inputSchema.title: GetMyUserRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving information about the currently authenticated user.

tools.name: DISCORD_LIST_MY_CONNECTIONS
tools.description: Retrieves a list of the authenticated user's connected third-party accounts on Discord.

tools.name: DISCORD_LIST_MY_GUILDS
tools.description: Lists the current user's guilds, returning partial data for each; primarily used for displaying server lists or verifying memberships.

inputSchema.title: ListMyGuildsRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Get guilds after this guild ID.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Max number of guilds to return (1-200, default 200).

before.title: Before
before.description: Get guilds before this guild ID.

with_counts.title: With Counts
with_counts.description: Include approximate member and presence counts for each guild (defaults to false).

inputSchema.description: Request to list the current user's guilds.
